headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TTO Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: handle_name
parameters.description: The handle name of the TTO Creator Marketplace creator that you want to search for. The exact match is supported. Note : If you specify the handle name of a creator that is not on TTO Creator Marketplace yet, an error will occur.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: handle_name
fields.description: The unique handle name of the creator.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The display name of the creator.

fields.name: profile_image
fields.description: Temporary URL for profile photo of the creator. Validity period: around seven days. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Once the URL expires, you can call /tto/tcm/creator/public/ to obtain a new URL.

fields.name: bio
fields.description: The bio description of the creator. Note : If the bio spans multiple lines, any line breaks within the bio will be represented as \n in the field value.

fields.name: followers_count
fields.description: The number of followers for the creator. Example: 100.

fields.name: following_count
fields.description: The number of accounts that the creator is following. Example: 100.

fields.name: videos_count
fields.description: The number of public videos posted by the creator. Example: 100.

fields.name: likes_count
fields.description: The number of likes on public videos posted by the creator. Example: 100.

fields.name: creator_id
fields.description: The unique ID of the creator. Example: 1234567891234567891 .

fields.name: median_views
fields.description: Median views. The middle value in the range of views across the creator's recent 30 videos, ranked lowest to highest, which showcases the typical video view count of their content.

fields.name: engagement_rate
fields.description: Engagement rate. The percentage of people interacted with content across the creator's recent 30 videos. It's calculated by taking the total number of comments, likes, and shares divided by video views. Example: 0.13669180870056152.

fields.name: creator_price
fields.description: The starting price of the creator. Example: 500.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The currency for the starting price, in ISO 4217 format. Example: USD .

fields.name: industry_labels
fields.description: The list of creator industry labels, which can be used to obtain Branded Content creator rankings on TTO Creator Leaderboard. Creator industry labels are assigned to creators based on the commercial content they produce, including ad creatives and branded content on their TikTok accounts, and represent their commercial experience in certain industries. Each label_id can be used in /tto/tcm/rank/ to obtain a list of up to 100 US creators who rank highest for that label.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The ID of the creator industry label. Example: 20000000000 .

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The name of the creator industry label. Example: Apps .

fields.name: content_labels
fields.description: The list of content tag labels, which can be used to obtain Organic Content creator rankings on TTO Creator Leaderboard. Content tag labels are assigned to creators based on the main focus of the creator’s TikTok account, and represent the direction of the creator’s organic content. Each label_id can be used in /tto/tcm/rank/ to obtain a list of up to 100 US creators who rank highest for that label.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The ID of the content tag label. Example: 11005001007 .

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The name of the content tag label. Example: Shooting Games .
